text: Zhivko Gospodinov (; 6 September 1957 - 4 May 2015) was a Bulgarian footballer. He was an attacking midfielder and playmaker. He played for Spartak Varna, Vatev Beloslav, Spartak Pleven, AD Fafe, Cherno More Varna and Beroe Stara Zagora from 1974 to 1992. Gospodinov was born in Vladimirovo. He died on 4 May 2015 in Varna, aged 57. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2015 deaths Category:1986 FIFA World Cup players Category:Bulgarian footballers
title: Zhivko Gospodinov
